Articles.Content: When approaching Kerbin I am seeing strange textures on the surface. This starts happening somewhere around 500,000 above the surface. I validated game cache and my graphics drivers are up-to-date. A temporary fix is to quicksave and quickload but it will do this again on the next approach. System specs: i5-3570k 3.40 ghz 8 gb of RAM GTX 960 graphics card 64-bit windows I'm running the regular steam version of this game with no mods. Here are the screenshots: ![p>
This should stop happening after a restart, it's a pretty old issue with no reliable reproduction steps, so it's near impossible to find the cause.
a restart is probably a good idea but as a quick workaround try going back to the space center and then back to your rocket, that usually works
It is happening everytime I fly back to Kerbin, even after restarting.
Okay then we'll need your game logs, dxdiag and your save as well, please see the support stickies for info.

> 
> Okay then we'll need your game logs, dxdiag and your save as well, please see the support stickies for info.
